mapper.sql: stock_user_id AS "stockUserId",urgent AS "urgent",enclosure AS "enclosure", storehouse_id AS "storeHouseId",register_time AS "time", theme AS "theme" , origin AS "origin" ,storehouse_positions_id AS "storehousePositionsId",source AS "source", source_id AS "sourceId", instock_order_id AS "instockOrderId", user_id AS "userId", coding AS "coding", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", state AS "state"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_instock_order where 1 = 1
and instock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.instockOrderId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
